channel.title: Experiences on Erika Deal
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Erika Deal

item.title: Web Developer
item.description: Partners for Our Children is where my front end development journey really kicked off. In my time here, I have learned everything from how to work with legacy code to building maintainable applications to working with non-technical stakeholders to work out project scope. Technologies have included Drupal, WordPress, and D3.js.

item.title: WordPress Developer
item.description: Worked with a local nonprofit to develop a website that helps them communicate events and resources to members.

item.title: WordPress Developer
item.description: Interned with a nonprofit organization to develop a custom WordPress theme and plugin along existing brand guidelines.

item.title: Junior Web Designer
item.description: Interned with an online publication to design and develop a custom WordPress theme. The site did not ship due to external factors, but I learned Sass, Grunt and Git along the way.

item.title: Graduate Assistant
item.description: Designed and developed WordPress and LMS-based websites for instructors at the University of Washington Information School.
